Handling Reductions in the Combined Evaluation
Normally, the new combined evaluation is the same as that shown in the initial FTR rating.
However, if the rating activity proposes to reduce the combined evaluation lower than the level originally proposed, send another notice of proposed adverse action before reducing the award based on the new combined evaluation.Â  In this case,
reduce the award as indicated in the original notice of proposed adverse action, and
send another notice of proposed adverse action informing the Veteran of the proposed additional reduction.
